messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Japanese Book Search Help
messages.msgSnippet: You ve got to thell us the book, my friend. If you sent it in an attachment, the groups email won t let it be distro d. Nate ...
messages.messageBody:
You've got to thell us the book, my friend. If you
sent it in an attachment, the groups email won't let
it be distro'd.

Nate

messages.subject: Japanese Book Search Help
messages.msgSnippet: Hello, Sorry to intrude and for the size of this missive/file... This list has proven to be filled with people much more fluent than I in Japanese. With this
messages.messageBody:
Hello,

Sorry to intrude and for the size of this missive/file...

This list has proven to be filled with people much more fluent than I in Japanese. With this in mind, I am hoping that someone can anyone tell me if this book is available via Amazon.co.jp and, if so, what the URL may be. Any help is greatly appreciated.

Thank you for you kind assistance.

Rick



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
